title: Desert Diary

properties.name: description
properties.value: For a list of every task sorted by certain requirements, see Achievement Diary/All achievements.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Desert achievements

For a list of every task sorted by certain requirements, see Achievement Diary/All achievements.

Desert Diary
Released 5 March 2015 (Update)
Area(s) Kharidian Desert (not including Al Kharid)
Members Yes
Item reward Amulet
Lamp XP rewards 2,500
7,500
15,000
50,000
Taskmaster(s) Jarr
Levels required
Total level: 1170
 50  ----  61
 ----  70  68
 40  36  ----
 50  91  85
 85  60  60
 94  95  35
 ----  65  ----
 78  47
85 ----

The Desert Diary is a set of achievement diaries whose tasks revolve around areas within the Kharidian Desert, such as Pollnivneach, Nardah and Sophanem.

Jarr's location.

Several skill, quest and item requirements are needed to complete all tasks. Unless stated otherwise, temporary skill boosts can be used to meet the skill requirements.

Rewards can be claimed from Jarr in the Shantay Pass. Note that the previous tiers of a diary must be completed to claim rewards of the next tier.

Contents

  • 1 Overview
  • 2 Easy
    • 2.1 Rewards
  • 3 Medium
    • 3.1 Rewards
  • 4 Hard
    • 4.1 Rewards
  • 5 Elite
    • 5.1 Rewards
  • 6 Changes

Overview[edit | edit source]

The rewards can be claimed from Jarr. He is located at Shantay Pass, just south of Al-Kharid.

Skill Requirements[1][2]
21
5
 
48+
Quest Requirements
Gertrude's Cat
Additional Requirements
Started Icthlarin's Little Helper
  1. ^ Some skills may be boostable, review the main section for more details.
  2. ^ In addition, some tasks of a lower tier may have higher requirements. Players must complete all the tasks of the previous tiers before they can claim the rewards for the current tier.

Rewards

  • Desert amulet 1
  • Antique lamp worth 2,500 experience in any skill above 30
  • Pharaoh's sceptre can hold up to 10 charges
  • Goats will always drop noted desert goat horn
  • Simon Templeton will now buy your noted artefacts too

Skill Requirements[1][2]

Additional Requirements
None
  1. ^ Some skills may be boostable, review the main section for more details.
  2. ^ In addition, some tasks of a lower tier may have higher requirements. Players must complete all the tasks of the previous tiers before they can claim the rewards for the current tier.

Rewards

  • Desert amulet 2
    • One teleport to Nardah per day
  • Antique lamp worth 7,500 experience in any skill above 40
  • Pharaoh's sceptre can hold up to 25 charges

Skill Requirements[1][2]

Additional Requirements
Defeat the Kalphite Queen.
  1. ^ Some skills may be boostable, review the main section for more details.
  2. ^ In addition, some tasks of a lower tier may have higher requirements. Players must complete all the tasks of the previous tiers before they can claim the rewards for the current tier.

Rewards

  • Desert amulet 3
  • Antique lamp worth 15,000 experience in any skill above 50
  • Pharaoh's sceptre can hold up to 50 charges
  • Access to the big window shortcut in Al Kharid Palace that takes you to the south of the palace, just north of the Shantay Pass, requiring 70 Agility
  • Unlocked the ability to toggle the Camulet teleport location between the inside and outside of Enakhra's Temple
  • All carpet rides are free
  • Zahur will create unfinished potions for 200 coins per potion from a vial of water and a clean herb. Items can be noted or unnoted
  • Zahur will now clean noted grimy herbs for 200 coins each.
  • Ropes placed at both the Kalphite Lair entrance and the Kalphite Queen tunnel entrance become permanent

Skill Requirements[1][2]
15
20

40
91

675+
Quest Requirements
Desert Treasure
Additional Requirements
Kalphite queen head
Started Icthlarin's Little Helper
  1. ^ Some skills may be boostable, review the main section for more details.
  2. ^ In addition, some tasks of a lower tier may have higher requirements. Players must complete all the tasks of the previous tiers before they can claim the rewards for the current tier.

Rewards

  • Desert amulet 4
    • Unlimited teleports to Nardah and the Kalphite Cave
    • The Nardah teleport now takes players directly inside the Elidinis shrine
    • 100% protection against desert heat when worn
  • Antique lamp worth 50,000 experience in any skill above 70
  • Pharaoh's sceptre can hold up to 100 charges
  • Free pass-through of the Shantay Pass
  • Access to a crevice shortcut, requiring 86 Agility, in the Kalphite Lair from the entrance to the antechamber before the Kalphite Queen boss room.

Easy[edit | edit source]

Items Required
  • 400 coins
  • Shantay pass (can be purchased at the Shantay Pass Shop)
  • Bird snare
  • Any pickaxe
  • 2 Ropes
  • Knife or any slash weapon
  • Desert shirt
  • Desert robe
  • Desert boots
  • Any grimy herb
  • Any Pyramid Plunder artefact
  • Empty waterskin
  • Weaponry, preferably Ranged or Magic

Recommended:

  • Necklace of passage
  • Nardah teleport
  • Food and antipoison, unless you already have a potato cactus
Skills Needed
  • 5 Hunter
  • 21 Thieving
Quests required
  • Started Icthlarin's Little Helper
    • Gertrude's Cat
Task Requirements
1. Catch a golden warbler.
  • 5 Hunter
  • Bird snare
  • Recommended: Necklace of passage to Eagle's Eyrie
2. Mine five clay in the north-eastern desert.
  • Any pickaxe
  • Recommended: Necklace of passage to Eagle's Eyrie
3. Enter the Kalphite Hive.
  • Rope
4. Enter the Desert with a set of desert robes equipped.
  • Desert shirt, robe, and boots
  • The desert robes from Rogue Trader and the black desert robes cannot be used
5. Kill a vulture (can be found north-west of Agility Pyramid).
  • Weaponry to kill it, preferably Ranged or Magic.
6. Have the Nardah herbalist (Zahur) clean a herb for you.
  • Any grimy herb and 200 coins
  • Recommended: Nardah teleport
7. Collect 5 potato cacti from the Kalphite Hive.
You can drop and pick up the same cactus five times inside the lair.
  • Rope
  • Food and antipoison are recommended if not bringing your own cactus
8. Sell some artefacts to Simon Templeton.
Note: The golden artefact from the top of the Agility Pyramid does not count.
  • Any Pyramid Plunder artefact (e.g. Stone scarab)
9. Open the sarcophagus in the first room of Pyramid Plunder.
  • Started Icthlarin's Little Helper or use of a Pharaoh's sceptre
  • 21 Thieving
10. Cut a desert cactus open to fill a waterskin.
  • Knife or a slash weapon, and an empty waterskin
11. Travel from the Shantay Pass to Pollnivneach by magic carpet.
  • 200 coins (5 more coins to buy a Shantay pass if entering the Desert via the pass)

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • Desert amulet 1
  • Antique lamp worth 2,500 experience in any skill above 30
  • Pharaoh's sceptre can hold up to 10 charges
  • Goats will always drop noted desert goat horn
  • Simon Templeton will now buy your noted artefacts too

Medium[edit | edit source]

Items Required
  • 200 coins
  • Ice cooler
  • Rope
  • Small fishing net
  • Any axe
  • Any light source
  • Scroll of redirection
  • Teleport to house
  • Harralander potion (unf)
  • Goat horn dust
  • Charged Camulet
Skills Needed
  • 37 Ranged[?]
  • 50 Crafting[?]
  • 45 Firemaking[?]
  • 43 Prayer[?]
  • 39 Magic[?]
  • 37 Mining[?]
  • 30 Agility
  • 22 Slayer
  • 47 Hunter
  • 37 Thieving[?]
  • 36 Herblore
  • 35 Woodcutting
  • 20 Construction
Quests required
  • The Golem
  • Enakhra's Lament
  • Spirits of the Elid
  • Eagles' Peak
Task Requirements
1. Climb to the summit of the Agility Pyramid (you must speak to Simon Templeton first).
  • 30 Agility
  • Recommended: Waterskins and desert clothing
  • Beware: When you are at the top (directly below the golden pyramid), you must climb
    the rocks, take the golden pyramid, and continue the dialogue for the task to count.
2. Slay a desert lizard.
  • 22 Slayer
  • Ice cooler
3. Catch an orange salamander.
  • 47 Hunter
  • Rope and a small fishing net
4. Steal a Phoenix feather from the Desert phoenix.
  • 25 Thieving
5. Travel to Uzer via magic carpet.
  • Completion of The Golem
  • 200 coins
6. Travel to the desert via the Eagle transport system.
  • Completion of Eagles' Peak
  • Rope
7. Pray at the Elidinis Statuette in Nardah (requires less than full Prayer points).
  • Completion of Spirits of the Elid
8. Create a combat potion in the desert (outside of desert cities).
  • 36 Herblore
  • Harralander potion (unf) and goat horn dust
9. Teleport to Enakhra's Temple with the Camulet.
  • Completion of Enakhra's Lament
  • Camulet
10. Visit the genie (achieved during Spirits of the Elid).
  • Rope and light source
11. Teleport to Pollnivneach with a redirected teleport to house tablet.
  • 20 Construction
  • Scroll of redirection and a house tablet
  • Ironman only: You must instead enter your house via the Pollnivneach house portal.
12. Chop some teak logs near Uzer (southeast of the ruins).
  • 35 Woodcutting
  • Any axe

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • Desert amulet 2
    • One teleport to Nardah per day
  • Antique lamp worth 7,500 experience in any skill above 40
  • Pharaoh's sceptre can hold up to 25 charges

Hard[edit | edit source]

Items Required
  • Any blackjack
  • Empty waterskin
  • Means to cast Humidify (an astral rune, a fire rune and 3 water runes)
  • Weaponry
  • Slayer helmet
  • Keris or Keris partisan
  • 5 mithril bars
  • Yew log
  • Tinderbox
  • Hammer
  • Any pickaxe
  • Any light source
Skills Needed
  • 10 Fletching[?]
  • 40 Ranged[?]
  • 31 Herblore[?]
  • 85 Combat level[?]
  • 60 Mining[?]
  • 55 Woodcutting[?]
  • 70 Agility
  • 68 Magic
  • 65 Thieving
  • 65 Slayer
  • 61 Crafting[?]
  • 50 Attack
  • 40 Defence[?]
  • 60 Firemaking
  • 68 Smithing
Quests required
  • Partial completion of The Feud
  • Dream Mentor
    • Lunar Diplomacy
      • The Fremennik Trials
      • Lost City
      • Rune Mysteries
      • Shilo Village
        • Jungle Potion
          • Druidic Ritual
    • Eadgar's Ruse
  • Desert Treasure
    • Priest in Peril
    • Waterfall Quest
    • Temple of Ikov
    • The Tourist Trap
    • The Dig Site
      • Druidic Ritual
    • Troll Stronghold
      • Death Plateau
  • Partial completion of Contact!
    • Prince Ali Rescue
    • Icthlarin's Little Helper
      • Gertrude's Cat
Task Requirements
1. Knock out and pickpocket a Menaphite Thug.
  • Partial completion of The Feud
  • 65 Thieving
  • Any blackjack
2. Mine some granite.
  • 45 Mining
  • Any pickaxe
3. Refill your waterskins in the Desert using Lunar spells (outside the desert cities).
  • Completion of Dream Mentor
  • 68 Magic and means to cast Humidify ( 1 3 1 )
  • Empty waterskin
4. Kill the Kalphite Queen (enough damage must be dealt to get a drop).
  • Weaponry to kill it
5. Complete a lap of the Pollnivneach Rooftop Course.
  • 70 Agility
6. Slay a Dust devil in the desert cave with a Slayer helmet equipped.
  • Started Desert Treasure
  • 65 Slayer and 10 Defence
  • Slayer helmet
7. Activate Ancient Magicks at the altar in the Jaldraocht Pyramid.
  • Completion of Desert Treasure
8. Defeat a locust rider (or a scarab mage) with Keris.
  • Partial completion of Contact!
  • 50 Attack
  • Keris (or Keris partisan) and any light source
  • Note that the Keris only needs to be equipped during its death animation,
    allowing you to deal damage with other weapons
9. Burn some yew logs on the Nardah Mayor's balcony.
  • 60 Firemaking
  • Yew log and a tinderbox
10. Create a Mithril platebody in Nardah.
  • 68 Smithing
  • 5 mithril bars and a hammer

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • Desert amulet 3
  • Antique lamp worth 15,000 experience in any skill above 50
  • Pharaoh's sceptre can hold up to 50 charges
  • Access to the big window shortcut in Al Kharid Palace that takes you to the south of the palace, just north of the Shantay Pass, requiring 70 Agility
  • Unlocked the ability to toggle the Camulet teleport location between the inside and outside of Enakhra's Temple
  • All carpet rides are free
  • Zahur will create unfinished potions for 200 coins per potion from a vial of water and a clean herb. Items can be noted or unnoted
  • Zahur will now clean noted grimy herbs for 200 coins each.
  • Ropes placed at both the Kalphite Lair entrance and the Kalphite Queen tunnel entrance become permanent

Elite[edit | edit source]

Items Required
  • 15,000 coins if you don't yet have a Skill Hall in your house
  • Raw wild pie
  • Means to cast Ice Barrage (2 blood runes, 4 death runes and 6 water runes)
  • Dragon dart tip
  • Feather
  • Stuffed kq head
  • 2 mahogany planks
  • 2 gold leaves
  • Saw
  • Hammer
Skills Needed
  • 15 Agility[?]
  • 10 Herblore[?]
  • 50 Firemaking[?]
  • 40 Ranged[?]
  • 20 Smithing[?]
  • 78 Construction
  • 85 Cooking
  • 95 Fletching
  • 94 Magic
  • 85 Prayer
  • 91 Thieving
Quests required
  • Desert Treasure
    • Priest in Peril
    • Waterfall Quest
    • Temple of Ikov
    • The Tourist Trap
    • The Dig Site
      • Druidic Ritual
    • Troll Stronghold
      • Death Plateau
  • Started Icthlarin's Little Helper
    • Gertrude's Cat
Task Requirements
1. Bake a wild pie at the Nardah clay oven.
  • 85 Cooking
  • Raw wild pie
2. Cast Ice Barrage against a foe in the Desert (outside of desert cities).
  • Completion of Desert Treasure
  • 94 Magic and means to cast Ice Barrage ( 6 2 4 )
3. Fletch some Dragon darts at the Bedabin Camp.
  • Completion of The Tourist Trap
  • 95 Fletching
  • Dragon dart tip and a feather.
4. Speak to the Kq head in your POH.
  • Completion of Priest in Peril
  • 78 Construction
  • Stuffed kq head, 2 mahogany planks, 2 gold leaves, a saw and a hammer
  • 15,000 coins are required if the player hasn't yet a Skill Hall in their house
5. Steal from the Grand Gold Chest in the final room of Pyramid Plunder.
  • Started Icthlarin's Little Helper or use of a Pharaoh's sceptre
  • 91 Thieving(not boostable)
6. Restore at least 85 Prayer points when praying at the altar in Sophanem.
  • Started Icthlarin's Little Helper
  • 85 Prayer(not boostable)

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • Desert amulet 4
    • Unlimited teleports to Nardah and the Kalphite Cave
    • The Nardah teleport now takes players directly inside the Elidinis shrine
    • 100% protection against desert heat when worn
  • Antique lamp worth 50,000 experience in any skill above 70
  • Pharaoh's sceptre can hold up to 100 charges
  • Free pass-through of the Shantay Pass
  • Access to a crevice shortcut, requiring 86 Agility, in the Kalphite Lair from the entrance to the antechamber before the Kalphite Queen boss room.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
25 November 2020
(update | poll)

The permanent ropes at both the Kalphite Lair and the Kalphite Queen tunnel entrances will now appear with the Hard Diary

26 March 2020
(update | poll)

The Nardah Teleport will now drop you inside the temple at Nardah with the Elite Diary

2 July 2015
(update | poll)

The agility shortcut unlocked as a reward from the Elite Desert achievement diary now takes you from the very start of the Kalphite Lair directly to the entrance of the Kalphite Queen boss room.

30 April 2015
(update | poll)

The ropes used to access the Kalphite Queen will stay permanently for players that have completed the elite desert achievement diary.

16 April 2015
(update)

Pollnivneach is now spelt correctly on the Desert task list.

16 April 2015
(update)

Murky Matt will only decant Pharoah's sceptres with the amount of charges you have unlocked from the desert diary.

style="width:50%;" | Task ! style="width:50%;" | Requirements |- |1. Catch a [[golden warbler]]. | *{{SCP|Hunter|5|link=y}} *[[Bird snare]] *''Recommended: [[Necklace of passage]] to Eagle's Eyrie'' |- |2. Mine five [[clay]] in the north-eastern desert. | *Any [[pickaxe]] *''Recommended: [[Necklace of passage]] to Eagle's Eyrie'' |- |3. Enter the [[Kalphite Lair|Kalphite Hive]]. | *[[Rope]] |- |4. Enter the [[Desert]] with a set of [[Desert clothing|desert robes]] equipped. | *[[Desert shirt]], [[Desert robe|robe]], and [[Desert boots|boots]] *The [[desert robes]] from [[Rogue Trader]] and the [[black desert robe]]s '''cannot''' be used |- |5. Kill a [[vulture]] (can be found north-west of [[Agility Pyramid]]). | *[[Weaponry]] to kill it, preferably [[Ranged]] or [[Magic]]. |- |6. Have the [[Zahur|Nardah herbalist]] (Zahur) clean a [[herb]] for you. | *Any [[grimy herb]] and 200 [[coins]] *''Recommended: [[Nardah teleport]]'' |- |7. Collect 5 [[potato cactus|potato cacti]] from the [[Kalphite Lair|Kalphite Hive]].
''You can drop and pick up the same cactus five times inside the lair.'' | *[[Rope]] *''[[Food]] and [[antipoison]] are recommended if not bringing your own [[potato cactus|cactus]]'' |- |8. Sell some artefacts to [[Simon Templeton]].
'''''Note:''' The golden artefact from the top of the [[Agility Pyramid]] does not count.'' | *Any [[Pyramid Plunder]] artefact (e.g. [[Stone scarab]]) |- |9. Open the sarcophagus in the first room of [[Pyramid Plunder]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Started [[Icthlarin's Little Helper]] or use of a [[Pharaoh's sceptre]] *{{SCP|Thieving|21|link=y}} |- |10. Cut a [[Kharidian cactus|desert cactus]] open to fill a [[waterskin]]. | *[[Knife]] or a slash weapon, and an empty [[waterskin]] |- |11. Travel from the [[Shantay Pass]] to [[Pollnivneach]] by [[magic carpet]]. | *200 [[coins]] (5 more coins to buy a [[Shantay pass (item)|Shantay pass]] if entering the [[Desert]] via the pass) |} ===Rewards=== *[[Desert amulet 1]] *[[Antique lamp]] worth 2,500 experience in any skill above 30 *[[Pharaoh's sceptre]] can hold up to 10 charges *[[Goat]]s will ''always'' drop [[Bank note|noted]] [[desert goat horn]] *[[Simon Templeton]] will now buy your [[Bank note|noted]] artefacts too ==Medium== {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Items Required |- | {{Checklist| *200 [[coins]] *[[Ice cooler]] *[[Rope]] *[[Small fishing net]] *Any [[axe]] *Any [[light source]] *[[Scroll of redirection]] *[[Teleport to house]] *[[Harralander potion (unf)]] *[[Goat horn dust]] *Charged [[Camulet]] }} |- | |} {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Skills Needed |- | {{Checklist| *{{SCP|Ranged|37|link=yes}}{{prereq}} *{{SCP|Crafting|50|link=yes}}{{prereq}} *{{SCP|Firemaking|45|link=yes}}{{prereq}} *{{SCP|Prayer|43|link=yes}}{{prereq}} *{{SCP|Magic|39|link=yes}}{{prereq}} *{{SCP|Mining|37|link=yes}}{{prereq}} *{{SCP|Agility|30|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Slayer|22|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Hunter|47|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Thieving|37|link=yes}}{{prereq}} *{{SCP|Herblore|36|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Woodcutting|35|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Construction|20|link=yes}} }} |} {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Quests required |- | {{Checklist|smallindent=yes|notoggleparent=yes| *[[The Golem]] *[[Enakhra's Lament]] *[[Spirits of the Elid]] *[[Eagles' Peak]] }} |} {| class="wikitable lighttable qc-active diary-table" style=width:750px; data-diary-name="Desert" data-diary-tier="Medium" ! style="width:50%;" | Task ! style="width:50%;" | Requirements |- |1. Climb to the summit of the [[Agility Pyramid]] (you '''must''' speak to [[Simon Templeton]] first). | *{{SCP|Agility|30|link=y}} *''Recommended: [[Waterskin]]s and [[desert clothing]]'' *'''''Beware:''' When you are at the top (directly below the golden pyramid), you must climb
the rocks, take the golden pyramid, and '''continue''' the dialogue for the task to count.'' |- |2. Slay a [[desert lizard]]. | *{{SCP|Slayer|22|link=y}} *[[Ice cooler]] |- |3. Catch an [[Orange salamander (Hunter)|orange salamander]]. | *{{SCP|Hunter|47|link=y}} *[[Rope]] and a [[small fishing net]] |- |4. Steal a [[Phoenix feather]] from the [[Desert phoenix]]. | *{{SCP|Thieving|25|link=y}} |- |5. Travel to [[Uzer]] via [[magic carpet]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[The Golem]] *200 [[coins]] |- |6. Travel to the [[desert]] via the [[Eagle transport system]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Eagles' Peak]] *[[Rope]] |- |7. Pray at the [[Elidinis Statuette]] in [[Nardah]] (requires less than full Prayer points). | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Spirits of the Elid]] |- |8. Create a [[combat potion]] in the [[desert]] (outside of desert cities). | *{{SCP|Herblore|36|link=y}} *[[Harralander potion (unf)]] and [[goat horn dust]] |- |9. Teleport to [[Enakhra's Temple]] with the [[Camulet]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Enakhra's Lament]] *[[Camulet]] |- |10. Visit the [[Genie (Spirits of the Elid)|genie]] (achieved during [[Spirits of the Elid]]). | *[[Rope]] and [[light source]] |- |11. Teleport to [[Pollnivneach]] with a redirected [[teleport to house]] tablet. | *{{SCP|Construction|20|link=y}} *[[Scroll of redirection]] and a [[house tablet]] *''[[Ironman]] only: You must instead enter your house via the Pollnivneach [[Portal (Player-owned house)|house portal]].'' |- |12. Chop some [[teak logs]] near [[Uzer]] (southeast of the ruins). | *{{SCP|Woodcutting|35|link=y}} *Any [[axe]] |} ===Rewards=== *[[Desert amulet 2]] **One teleport to [[Nardah]] per day *[[Antique lamp]] worth 7,500 experience in any skill above 40 *[[Pharaoh's sceptre]] can hold up to 25 charges ==Hard== {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Items Required |- | {{Checklist| *Any [[blackjack]] *Empty [[waterskin]] *Means to cast [[Humidify]] (an [[astral rune]], a [[fire rune]] and 3 [[water runes]]) *[[Weaponry]] *[[Slayer helmet]] *[[Keris]] or [[Keris partisan]] *5 [[mithril bar]]s *[[Yew log]] *[[Tinderbox]] *[[Hammer]] *Any [[pickaxe]] *Any [[light source]] }} |} {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Skills Needed |- | {{Checklist| *{{SCP|Fletching|10|link=yes}}{{Prereq}} *{{SCP|Ranged|40|link=yes}}{{Prereq}} *{{SCP|Herblore|31|link=yes}}{{Prereq}} *{{SCP|Combat|85|link=yes}}{{Prereq}} *{{SCP|Mining|60|link=yes}}{{Prereq}} *{{SCP|Woodcutting|55|link=yes}}{{Prereq}} *{{SCP|Agility|70|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Magic|68|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Thieving|65|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Slayer|65|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Crafting|61|link=yes}}{{Prereq}} *{{SCP|Attack|50|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Defence|40|link=yes}}{{Prereq}} *{{SCP|Firemaking|60|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Smithing|68|link=yes}} }} |} {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Quests required |- | {{Checklist|smallindent=yes|notoggleparent=yes| *Partial completion of [[The Feud]] *[[Dream Mentor]] **[[Lunar Diplomacy]] ***[[The Fremennik Trials]] ***[[Lost City]] ***[[Rune Mysteries]] ***[[Shilo Village]] ****[[Jungle Potion]] *****[[Druidic Ritual]] **[[Eadgar's Ruse]] *[[Desert Treasure]] **[[Priest in Peril]] **[[Waterfall Quest]] **[[Temple of Ikov]] **[[The Tourist Trap]] **[[The Dig Site]] ***[[Druidic Ritual]] **[[Troll Stronghold]] ***[[Death Plateau]] *Partial completion of [[Contact!]] **[[Prince Ali Rescue]] **[[Icthlarin's Little Helper]] ***[[Gertrude's Cat]] }} |} {| class="wikitable lighttable qc-active diary-table" style=width:750px; data-diary-name="Desert" data-diary-tier="Hard" ! style="width:50%;" | Task ! style="width:50%;" | Requirements |- |1. Knock out and [[pickpocket]] a [[Menaphite Thug]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Partial completion of [[The Feud]] *{{SCP|Thieving|65|link=y}} *Any [[blackjack]] |- |2. Mine some [[granite]]. | *{{SCP|Mining|45|link=y}} *Any [[pickaxe]] |- |3. Refill your [[waterskin]]s in the [[Desert]] using [[Lunar spells]] (outside the desert cities). | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Dream Mentor]] *{{SCP|Magic|68|link=y}} and means to cast [[Humidify]] ({{RuneReq|Astral=1|Fire=1|Water=3}}) *Empty [[waterskin]] |- |4. Kill the [[Kalphite Queen]] (enough damage must be dealt to get a drop). | *[[Weaponry]] to kill it |- |5. Complete a lap of the [[Pollnivneach Rooftop Course]]. | *{{SCP|Agility|70|link=y}} |- |6. Slay a [[Dust devil]] in the [[Smoke Dungeon|desert cave]] with a [[Slayer helmet]] equipped. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Started [[Desert Treasure]] *{{SCP|Slayer|65|link=y}} and {{SCP|Defence|10|link=y}} *[[Slayer helmet]] |- |7. Activate [[Ancient Magicks]] at the altar in the [[Jaldraocht Pyramid]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Desert Treasure]] |- |8. Defeat a [[locust rider]] (or a [[scarab mage]]) with [[Keris]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Partial completion of [[Contact!]] *{{SCP|Attack|50|link=y}} *[[Keris]] (or [[Keris partisan]]) and any [[light source]] *''Note that the Keris only needs to be equipped during its death animation,
allowing you to deal damage with other weapons'' |- |9. Burn some [[yew logs]] on the [[Nardah]] Mayor's balcony. | *{{SCP|Firemaking|60|link=y}} *[[Yew log]] and a [[tinderbox]] |- |10. Create a [[Mithril platebody]] in [[Nardah]]. | *{{SCP|Smithing|68|link=y}} *5 [[mithril bar]]s and a [[hammer]] |} ===Rewards=== *[[Desert amulet 3]] *[[Antique lamp]] worth 15,000 experience in any skill above 50 *[[Pharaoh's sceptre]] can hold up to 50 charges *Access to the [[Big window (Al Kharid)|big window]] [[shortcut]] in [[Al Kharid Palace]] that takes you to the south of the palace, just north of the [[Shantay Pass]], requiring 70 [[Agility]] *Unlocked the ability to toggle the [[Camulet]] teleport location between the inside and outside of [[Enakhra's Temple]] *All [[carpet ride]]s are free *[[Zahur]] will create [[Unfinished potion (disambiguation)|unfinished potions]] for {{NoCoins|200}} coins per potion from a [[vial of water]] and a clean [[herb]]. Items can be noted or unnoted *[[Zahur]] will now clean noted [[grimy herb]]s for {{NoCoins|200}} coins each. *[[Rope]]s placed at both the [[Kalphite Lair]] entrance and the [[Kalphite Queen]] tunnel entrance become permanent ==Elite== {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Items Required |- | {{Checklist| *15,000 [[coins]] if you don't yet have a [[Hall_(skill_trophies)|Skill Hall]] in your [[house]] *[[Raw wild pie]] *Means to cast [[Ice Barrage]] (2 [[blood rune]]s, 4 [[death rune]]s and 6 [[water runes]]) *[[Dragon dart tip]] *[[Feather]] *[[Stuffed kq head]] *2 [[mahogany plank]]s *2 [[gold leaves]] *[[Saw]] *[[Hammer]] }} |} {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Skills Needed |- | {{Checklist| *{{SCP|Agility|15|link=yes}}{{Prereq}} *{{SCP|Herblore|10|link=yes}}{{Prereq}} *{{SCP|Firemaking|50|link=yes}}{{Prereq}} *{{SCP|Ranged|40|link=yes}}{{Prereq}} *{{SCP|Smithing|20|link=yes}}{{Prereq}} *{{SCP|Construction|78|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Cooking|85|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Fletching|95|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Magic|94|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Prayer|85|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Thieving|91|link=yes}} }} |} {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Quests required |- | {{Checklist|smallindent=yes|notoggleparent=yes| *[[Desert Treasure]] **[[Priest in Peril]] **[[Waterfall Quest]] **[[Temple of Ikov]] **[[The Tourist Trap]] **[[The Dig Site]] ***[[Druidic Ritual]] **[[Troll Stronghold]] ***[[Death Plateau]] *Started [[Icthlarin's Little Helper]] **[[Gertrude's Cat]] }} |} {| class="wikitable lighttable qc-active diary-table" style=width:750px; data-diary-name="Desert" data-diary-tier="Elite" ! style="width:50%;" | Task ! style="width:50%;" | Requirements |- |1. Bake a [[wild pie]] at the [[Nardah]] clay oven. | *{{SCP|Cooking|85|link=y}} *[[Raw wild pie]] |- |2. Cast [[Ice Barrage]] against a foe in the [[Desert]] (outside of desert cities). | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Desert Treasure]] *{{SCP|Magic|94|link=y}} and means to cast [[Ice Barrage]] ({{RuneReq|Death=4|Blood=2|Water=6}}) |- |3. Fletch some [[Dragon dart]]s at the [[Bedabin Camp]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[The Tourist Trap]] *{{SCP|Fletching|95|link=y}} *[[Dragon dart tip]] and a [[feather]]. |- |4. Speak to the [[Kalphite Queen head (mounted)|Kq head]] in your [[POH]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Priest in Peril]] *{{SCP|Construction|78|link=y}} *[[Stuffed kq head]], 2 [[mahogany plank]]s, 2 [[gold leaves]], a [[saw]] and a [[hammer]] *15,000 [[coins]] are required if the player hasn't yet a [[Hall_(skill_trophies)|Skill Hall]] in their [[house]] |- |5. Steal from the Grand Gold Chest in the final room of [[Pyramid Plunder]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Started [[Icthlarin's Little Helper]] or use of a [[Pharaoh's sceptre]] *{{SCP|Thieving|91|link=y}}{{Boostable|no}} |- |6. Restore at least 85 [[Prayer points]] when praying at the [[altar]] in [[Sophanem]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Started [[Icthlarin's Little Helper]] *{{SCP|Prayer|85|link=y}}{{Boostable|no}} |} ===Rewards=== *[[Desert amulet 4]] **Unlimited teleports to [[Nardah]] and the [[Kalphite Cave]] **The [[Nardah]] teleport now takes players directly inside the Elidinis shrine **100% protection against [[desert heat]] when worn *[[Antique lamp]] worth 50,000 experience in any skill above 70 *[[Pharaoh's sceptre]] can hold up to 100 charges *Free pass-through of the [[Shantay Pass]] *Access to a [[Crevice (Kalphite Lair)|crevice]] [[shortcut]], requiring 86 [[Agility]], in the [[Kalphite Lair]] from the entrance to the antechamber before the [[Kalphite Queen]] boss room. ==Changes== {{Subject changes header}} {{Subject changes |change = The permanent ropes at both the Kalphite Lair and the Kalphite Queen tunnel entrances will now appear with the Hard Diary |date = 25 November 2020 |poll = Old School Content Poll 73: The :Joy: of Polls |update = Twisted Tales - Getting Ahead Launch }} {{Subject changes |change = The Nardah Teleport will now drop you inside the temple at Nardah with the Elite Diary |date = 26 March 2020 |poll = Old School Content Poll 70: Game Improvements |update = Game Improvements (26 March 2020) }} {{Subject changes |date = 2 July 2015 |update = Clue Scroll Step Counter |poll = Old School Content Poll 34: XP droplets & Slayer |change = The [[Shortcut|agility shortcut]] unlocked as a reward from the [[Desert Elite Diary|Elite Desert achievement diary]] now takes you from the very start of the Kalphite Lair directly to the entrance of the Kalphite Queen boss room. }} {{Subject changes |date = 30 April 2015 |update = Mutagens, Mo & Much More |poll = Old School Content Poll 32: Resizable Mode |change = The ropes used to access the Kalphite Queen will stay permanently for players that have completed the elite desert achievement diary. }} {{Subject changes |date = 16 April 2015 |update = Clan Wars Game Modes & More |change = Pollnivneach is now spelt correctly on the Desert task list. }} {{Subject changes |date = 16 April 2015 |update = Clan Wars Game Modes & More |change = Murky Matt will only decant Pharoah's sceptres with the amount of charges you have unlocked from the desert diary. }} {{Subject changes footer}} {{Achievement diary}}
